__e: Even if you're right, we are safe here.
I told you we'd be safe here, and we are.
We'll be safe here until we figure out our next move.
It's okay. We are safe now.
At least we're safe now to do what we do in peace and comfort.
I didn't come here today to make a speech, but I will say this, these children are now safe.
I'd say we're safe for another two hours.
Children aren't safe around you, Emilia. I think we've proven that.
- Yes, we're safe and well. - [airplane humming]
Because we're here now. We're safe, and we're gonna stay.
That would not have made us safe. And you know this.
But you are in safe hands now.
- We have felt so safe with you... - We'll wait and see.
I need to know it's safe.
You'll yield to keep them safe, to keep them alive.
But you don't have to worry about it.
When we're safe from those men, we go back where there's lots of people, huh?
